edu.umn.shibboleth.sp
[Java] Class ShibbolethAuthenticationProvider

java.lang.Object
  edu.umn.shibboleth.sp.ShibbolethAuthenticationProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
class ShibbolethAuthenticationProvider

An org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider implementation that integrates with the native Shibboleth SP (Service Provider). This AuthenticationProvider is capable of validating ShibbolethAuthenticationToken requests which contain an eppn name equal to HttpServletRequest.remoteUser

Authors:
Aaron J. Zirbes
